Description: Upper section of a steatite shabti of Pediamenope with a lappet-wig, a carved face(worn) and ears, crossed hands(worn) holding the two incised hoes, the waist is inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in one(surviving) row of incised Hieroglyphs extending almost around the whole body, the back of one arm is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket.
Condition: worn and incomplete - lower section missing
